pkgmetadata.longdescription: Index Number Calculation // Computes bilateral and multilateral index numbers. It has support for many standard bilateral indexes as well as multilateral index number methods such as GEKS, GEKS-Tornqvist (or CCDI), Geary-Khamis and the weighted time product dummy (for details on these methods see Diewert and Fox (2020) doi:10.1080/07350015.2020.1816176). It also supports updating of multilateral indexes using several splicing methods.
